BayesPharma 0.0.1

    Dose_Response_of_Damgo Modeling the Pnear Distribution

    Function reference

    All functions

    Pnear()
    Compute the Pnear quality metric for RMSD funnel
    add_loo_criterion()
    Add model fit loo criterion to model objects
    basic_stats()
    Displays a tibble of mean, median, standard deviation, and confidence intervals
    calculate_log_dose()
    Add a log dose (in base 10) column to the input data.frame
    change_col_names
    Change column names to be compatible with BayesPharma functions
    compare_models()
    Compare different model fits against each other using loo compare
    constant_formula()
    Formula for the constant curve
    dr_formula()
    Create a formula for a one or multiple different perturbations/experimental variables for the brms model
    dr_inits()
    Create a list of initial values of the model parameters
    dr_model()
    Run Bayesian Regression Model using Stan
    dr_priors()
    data.frame of pre-determined priors of parameters to be predicted by the model
    dr_stanvar
    stanvar function
    n_sample_draws
    Dataframe of posterior samples of modeled parameters from brmsfit model.
    plot_draws_data()
    Create a plot of the predicted responses from the posterior distribution
    model
    Perform Posterior Predictive Check
    plot_trajectories()
    Create a plot of the predicted responses from the posterior distribution
    posterior_densities()
    Create a plot of the posterior density distributions of modeled parameters from brmsfit
    posterior_mean()
    Tibble of predictors, mean ec50, mean hill, mean top, mean bottom, and mean Response of the posterior distribution.
    posterior_response_draws()
    Data.frame of draw_id, predictors, ec50, hill, top, bottom, and Response from a sample of the posterior distribution
    prior_densities()
    Create a plot of the prior density distributions of modeled parameters from brmsfit with sample_prior = "only".
    prior_posterior_densities()
    Create a plot of the prior & posterior density distributions of modeled parameters from brmsfit
    traceplot
    Create a trace plot of MCMC draws
